text: hi <@U026F530R8Q> - how many WF do you have active at the time? Maybe with the lists, and then use that list as a trigger in WF to inform you when this kind of situation happens? Or - you have settings options where you can unenroll contacts from WF if {{criteria}}.

Thanks, <@U01ASFZL4UA>. We are actually new to HubSpot and are in the process of creating them. We have a few but most are listed out to create and we’re worried about there being issues. I love your idea on the setting options to unenroll contacts if. I think we’ll also review the WF’s before we create them and have a tracker moving forward so others know to review them prior to creating anything new.

Hi all, does anyone a similar use case for sending payment reminder at specific hour of a client's local time zone? Based on my understanding, HS can only accept three kind of delay which none of those can be applied to my use case.  Any recommendation? Thanks
